ygData.subject: Re: Bind Affinity Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: You can bind anywhere, you can only bind other people in cities if they are grouped with you.
ygData.messageBody:
You can bind anywhere, you can only bind other people in cities if they are
grouped with you.


At 06:03 PM 5/18/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
>Can any of my elder brethren tell me if Bind Affinity will work in any
>zone, or only in major cities? I am level 11 now and hope to be binding
>soon. Also, can anyone tell me where I can find Eye of Zomm in Qeynos? I
>just want to increase my conjuration skill, which is at "awful" level.
>Thanks for any reply.
>
>Greg (Kronan)
>
